_exec_summary.SummaryText: This facility complies with ANSI Standard K-61.1-1995 requirements for anhydrous ammonia storage and it is our policy to adhere to all applicable federal state and local laws. If an emergency were to occur, it is our policy to notify the Aplington Fire Department ( via a 911 call) and request that they respond to the emergency.                                                                                                                                                                     This facility is a anhydrous ammonia retail outlet to the area farmers. Consisting of storage tanks and associated pumps and plumbing.                                                                                                                                                                       This facility complies with EPA's accident prevention rule and all state and local codes and regulations.                                 We have never had an accident involving anhydrous ammonia that caused death injuries property or environmental damage, evacuations or shelterings in place.                                                                                                                                     In the event of an emergency involving our ammonia plant it is our policy to notify the Butler County Sheriff Office and Aplington Fire Department through 911 to request that they respond to the emergency. We have discussed this policy with the fire department members :members have inspected our ammonia plant.                                                                                      At this time there are no plans to change our facility for improved safety.
